name: MuFGC
description:
A simple, micro-sized kickboxing fighting game for your browser. Plays for two. (2 players required for maximum playability.)

Controls
  • Player 1: WAS keys to move, D to attack
  • Player 2: Arrow keys left, right, up to move, down to attack.
Idiosyncracies

This game has 3 fight scenarios: forest, moon, octagon (UFC etc...). Each scenario has one round. Sudden death. What-have-you. Etc.

Enjoy!
